Description: Someone else intercepting transmission between user and the server
Impact: Risk of breach of confidential data
Response - how to prevent: Use "Let's encode" to generate an SSL certificate

Likelihood: Depends on how effective hashing is and number of attempts
Impact: Compromises a user's account until detected
Contingency - to do if happens: Lock out the users account when detected, and allow users to request an e-mail with new password
Response - how to prevent: Use of one-way hashes of passwords

Likelihood: Need my original password to log into ecowebhosting
Contingency - to do if happens: Change my password - BUT also need to detect it
